mapper.insert: insert into cs_activation_statistics (N_ID, CHANNEL, PRODUCT_NAME, PHONE_SERIAL_NUM, DATA_SOURCE, `OPERATOR`, IS_ACTIVATION, IS_TOUCHUP, TOUCHUP_TYPE, STR0, STR1, COMP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODI_BY, MODI_TIME, ORG_ID, SORT_NUM, `STATUS`) values (#{nId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneSerialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isActivation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isTouchup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{touchupType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{str0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{str1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modiBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modiTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update cs_activation_statistics set CHANNEL = #{channel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_SERIAL_NUM = #{phoneSerialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_SOURCE = #{dataSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `OPERATOR` = #{operator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_ACTIVATION = #{isActivation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_TOUCHUP = #{isTouchup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOUCHUP_TYPE = #{touchupType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STR0 = #{str0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR1 = #{str1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODI_BY = #{modiBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MODI_TIME = #{modiTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SORT_NUM = #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where N_ID = #{nId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select N_ID, CHANNEL, PRODUCT_NAME, PHONE_SERIAL_NUM, DATA_SOURCE, `OPERATOR`, IS_ACTIVATION, IS_TOUCHUP, TOUCHUP_TYPE, STR0, STR1, COMP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODI_BY, MODI_TIME, ORG_ID, SORT_NUM, `STATUS` from cs_activation_statistics where N_ID = #{nId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select N_ID, CHANNEL, PRODUCT_NAME, PHONE_SERIAL_NUM, DATA_SOURCE, `OPERATOR`, IS_ACTIVATION, IS_TOUCHUP, TOUCHUP_TYPE, STR0, STR1, COMP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODI_BY, MODI_TIME, ORG_ID, SORT_NUM, `STATUS` from cs_activation_statistics
